attributes.action: approve a banking licence for Cattles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cattles is a up and coming bank that has an excellent track record for safe, wise investments and given the chance I feel that that could become an excellent model of which some of the larger, currently struggling banks could learn alot from.

reasons: Commercial endorsement, promotion of any product, service or publication, or statements that amount to adverts
